original_title: Teacher transfers will not be extended beyond March 24: Ministry
original_body_lines: The temporary transfers given to teachers during the year 2022, considering the pandemic and crisis situations, will not be extended beyond March 24, the Education Ministry said.

During the crisis period in 2022, the Education Ministry took steps to give teachers conditional relief, taking into consideration the difficulties in travelling and transportation. Teachers were temporarily assigned to schools nearest to their places of residence.

However, the ministry said these transfer appointments will not be extended beyond March 24. A detailed announcement will be conveyed to the relevant provincial and zonal education directors, the ministry added. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
